                     (5)




                                              Cruiseport Trolley
s For your safety, do not cross in front of
 the bus. Let the bus pass and look both
 ways before crossing street.
s No smoking, eating or drinking.
s No loud talking, noise or radios.
s Offensive behavior will not be tolerated.
 The offender will be subject to ejection
 from the bus.
s Pay or show pass upon boarding - exact
 change is required.
s Appropriate dress, shirt and shoes
 required
s No rollerblades.
s Only caged or service animals allowed.
